intro: Adenoselen, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a member of the Asteraceae family. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage, which gives it its common name. The plant produces small, yellow flowers that are typically clustered in composite heads. Adenoselen is native to parts of Africa and is often found in arid or semi-arid environments. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for both ecological and horticultural study.
